casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.E.C. 82PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2017 Joyce L. Terres, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McCoy, James. Beth Hall, GAL Attorney Advocate, for GAL. Elizabeth Kennedy-Gurney, Attorney at Law, Christopher L. Carr, Attorney at Law, for Cumberland County DSS.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of April 2017 by Respondent-Appellee:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of April 2017."

Respondent-Appellee shall have up to and including the 5th day of June 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
